  • Implementing measures to safeguard users data

title: Android Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
Android Mobile App Developer!Wanted:

Android Developer

Job Location:

Chennai ,  TamilNadu

Relevant Experience:

2 to 5 years of experience

Salary Band:

Negotiable

No. of Positions:

3

Job purpose:

We are looking for an app developer to lead development ,  maintenance and testing of Android phone and tablet apps. The developer will participate in the entire app lifecycle right from analysis stage until delivery and post launch support.

Main tasks and responsibilities:

Person specification:

Skills Required:

Competencies for success:

Deliver across the entire app life cycle concept ,  design ,  build ,  deploy ,  test ,  release to Play Store and support. Working along the web developers to create and maintain a robust framework to support the apps Create compelling device specific user interfaces and experiences. Optimising performance for the apps Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies. Explain technologies and solutions to technical and non - technical stakeholders. Attend industry events /  conference both attending and presenting.Excellent knowledge in information architecture ,  human computer interaction and usability design principles Ability to use analytic data and user testing to inform design decision Ability to multi task and good time management skills Ability to work on their own and as a part of the team Excellent scoping and estimation skills Excellent scoping and estimation skills Excellent testing /  QA skills Excellent communication skills (verbal and written) to liaise with various departments locally and internationallyMust have working experience with Android Studio Must have good understanding of Android Material Design Guidelines Must have good understanding of Java and the Android SDK Publishing to the Google Play Store Experience on web service (REST ,  JSON) , payment gateway and maps integration Experience of development using web technologies Understanding of HTML5 ,  JavaScript ,  jQuery is a plus Experience building web and native apps Optimising performance for the apps Excellent debugging ,  optimisation and testing skillsCreativity Learning on the Fly Technical Learning Action Orientated Dealing with Ambiguity Peer Relationships Time Management Written Communications Problem Solving

title: Xamarin Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
Cavintek is seeking a talented and highly motivated individual who possesses the technical knowledge to fill the Xamarin Mobile App Developer position.

Responsibilities and Duties

  • Develop cross-platform mobile application by using C#.net and Xamarin framework for both Android and iOS.
  • Ability to work independently with little direction
  • Plan, Design, Develop, Test, Deploy and Monitors cross-platform mobile apps.
  • Writes high-quality code for the mobile application and rich user experiences.
  • Testing the product in controlled, real situations before going live.
  • Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
  • Play a lead role in evaluating new mobile technologies and develop plans for their implementation.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Qualifications and Skills

  • Experience: 1 to 2 Years
  • Strong knowledge of Native Cross-platform application development on Xamarin forms (Mandate).
  • Experience in Multi-Threading, Memory Management, C#, JSON, Web Services and Task Parallel Library (TPL).
  • Experience using XAML for UI designs.
  • Good knowledge of UI design principles (Android and iOS).
  • Good knowledge of concepts like Resources, Markup extensions, dependency properties, Databinding, and Commands.
  • Excellent knowledge of C#, .Net Framework, Object-oriented programming concepts, and Linq.
  • Experience in Integrating web services developed in SOAP/ Web API / WCF (Web services) with UI.
  • Understanding and implementation of MVVM design pattern.
  • Experience publishing apps in either the Google Play Store or Apple App Store.
  • Strong Troubleshooting skills to resolve Technical Skills.
  • Passionate about advancements in technologies.
  • Good Communication Skill

title: Global Mobility Consultant

ambitionBoxData.Title: Jacobs Engineering Group Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Primary responsibilities :


  • Incorporating elevated quality, provide a high-touch, concierge style service to Jacobs mobilizing talent by serving as a single point of contact for the assignee/transferee throughout the transfer and/or assignment lifecycle
  • Utilizing a project management mindset, own the coordination of contingencies, vendor services, and all assignment management aspects for a successful assignment or relocation
  • With the support of AssignmentPro (APRO), follow the established procedures to issue assignment documentation, provide assignment briefings, track for key milestone dates in the mobilization process, and provide ongoing communication through the assignment lifecycle
  • Work collaboratively with GM Immigration POC's and cross-functional stakeholders to ensure a consistent and compliant approach globally
  • Participate in recurring vendor calls to proactively address relocation, immigration, or tax issues before they become a problem for the employee or project
  • Partner with the HR Delivery teams to ensure effective program delivery and communication
  • Maintain timely and accurate assignment/relocation records as part of established mobilization process and procedures
  • Proactively look for new opportunities to improve the overall Global Mobility experience across the business lines globally
  • Close monitoring of AssignmentPro (APRO) technology to ensure effective workflow; regular recommendations needed from GM Consultant for new letter templates, project entitlements, process improvement in the system, etc.


Preferred candidate profile :

  • Experience working in a high touch customer service environment or Global Mobility in a large global organization
  • Good understanding of expat tax, social security and immigration matters, from an international assignment perspective
  • Excellent Communication Skills
  • Exposure to differing Global Mobility policies and procedures a plusSolution Driven
  • Experience working in a Center of Excellence atmosphere a plus

Flexible work schedule to meet the time zones of our mobilizing staff
